case.title: i am an nice and decent Asian man
case.text: hi , good afternoon, i am an nice and decent Asian man, height 5.8 i am around 30 years old, and live in white plans , i have stable job and well educated, and am average build , try to find someone nice and genuine and sincere, someone attractive and around my age or a bit older, someone healthy and drug and disease free, i prefer someone is pretty Spanish , Asian , white , Italian , east Indian cos i get along with them easier and better. thanks and looking forward to hear from you, please attach your pic, and tell me a bit about yourself i would like to reply to serious person.
